forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and a few thundershowers likely during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
